childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: Henlo! It’s time for a recap of recent events in April, and a sneek peek of what’s coming up next. Stay tuned!

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Henlo! It’s time for a recap of recent events in April, and a sneek peek of what’s coming up next. What an exciting kick off of events!

Recaps

  • First of all, we had the Easter get-togethers, hosted in Brisbane by our hosts Yuki and Viet, and in Melbourne by Sam. Anyone want do to do one in Sydney ? :D
  • Mr Q’s Night Class opened its first session on the Graph data structure and graph traversal algorithms. This served as a foundation for…
  • [Vietnamese Aussies in IT x Quang Huynh x Thien Bui] N0Fail Contest 2021 - Our first ever coding contest!! This is also the stepping stones for our members to the mind bending sports known as Competitive Programming. As our first time hosting came into a few hiccups (like question E has some few weak test cases, so we had to work overtime to get the results out by hand), the organizers have received a lot of positive feedback from our members. :D Tune in for next time!

What’s next ?

  • Mr Q’s Night Class is opening a second session on Sunday night, Apr 11 2021 from 9PM AEST to solve the question D in N0Fail contest - Quang’s Journey. More information can be found in our Discord server under the channel #nofail-contest.
  • The next one is a tech talk: Introduction to GitOps. If you know git, and have some interest in project management, this is surely beneficial, so don’t miss it! We’ll post more information in another post.
  • And then we move on to the next topic: Release Management. A software project never really ends, we just mark on release to deploy/deliver and move on to the next. So, how do you manage a release version? See you in this tech talk.
  • Last but not least, we’re still looking for tech talk topics and speakers for May 2021. If you’re interested, please don’t hesitate to send us a message ;)

shortBio.shortBio:
We're a group of IT Geeks in Australia.

Come find us on [GitHub](https://github.com/viet-aus-it/ "VAIT GitHub"), [Discord](https://chat.vietausit.com "VAIT Discord"), Facebook [group](https://fb.vietausit.com/ "VAIT FB Group") and [page](https://www.facebook.com/vietausit "VAIT FB Page").
